title.rendered: OmniGeometry Offline Version for Mac OS and Telegram Group

content.rendered:
OmniGeometry just got a whole lot better!

After a lot of hard work and testing we are proud to finally launch the offline version for Mac OS (Windows will be available soon).

So, if you purchased a lifetime subscription and you are subscribed to our newsletter you should have already received an email with the instructions on how to get your copy.

If you did not receive our newsletter please send us an email with the following details:

1) Your OmniGeometry username
2) Email address you used at the time of registration

After we have received your details and confirmed your lifetime membership we will send you an email with the link to download the software and your unique license key.

If you registered for the lifetime membership after May 11th 2020 you don’t need to send us any information and you should get access to the offline version within 24-48hrs.

NEW TELEGRAM GROUP!

We are excited to announce that we just created a private Telegram group for OmniGeometry users. The intent behind this group is to:

1) Allow you to share your art in a higher resolution format.

Unfortunately the sharing options on Instagram greatly diminished the resolution of the original artwork. Through Telegram you’ll be able to share uncompressed files so that we can share your work on our social media platforms and give you exposure (of course you always have the full rights to your art 😉

2) Allow users to share ideas and collaborate with each other.

If you see other OmniGeometry users doing things with the software that inspire you then simply ask them how they achieved that specific effect or look. Or if you see an artist with a style that would complement your own and you would like to collaborate then simply message them and get to work.

To join please access the members area and under announcements you’ll find the link to join!

Best regards,

OmniGeometry Team
